generated_body: If you click on the article titled "THEN AND NOW: What all your favorite '90s stars are doing today," you can expect to read about the current status and careers of popular celebrities from the 1990s. The article will likely highlight how these stars have evolved over the years, discussing their recent projects, personal lives, and any notable changes in their public image.
